page.description: Bind style sheet automation to a definition property.

property.name: Styles
property.description:
Array of NamedStyleAuto
Array of styles.

methodref.name: Bind
methodref.description: Bind style sheet automation to a definition property.

methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Convert visual style string to an visual style definition.

methodref.name: MoveStyle
methodref.description: Move a block of Style items.

methodref.name: ToString
methodref.description: Output the visual style string that represents the visual style definition.

methodref.name: Clone
methodref.description: Create a copy of an object instance.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.
